verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> le-'A-Saf of Asaph אֵ֤ל׀ <WH410> 'el The mighty אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> 'elo-Him God יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [even] the LORD דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> vai-yik-ra- and called אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; the earth מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> mi-miz-ra-cho-She,- from the rising שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> mesh of the sun עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- to its מְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH3996> me-vo-'O. unto the going down
מִצִּיּ֥וֹן <WH6726> mitz-tzi-Yon Out of Zion מִכְלַל־ <WH4359> mich-lal- the perfection יֹ֗פִי <WH3308> Yo-fi, of beauty אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God הוֹפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3313> ho-Fi-a'. hath shined

יָ֤בֹ֥א <WH935> ya-Vo shall come אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, Our God וְֽאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- and not יֶ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <WH2790> ye-che-Rash and shall not keep silence אֵשׁ־ <WH784> 'esh- a fire לְפָנָ֥יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> to-Chel; shall devour וּ֝סְבִיבָ֗יו <WH5439> u-se-vi-Vav, round about נִשְׂעֲרָ֥ה <WH8175> nis-'a-Rah tempestuous מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. him and it shall be very

יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> yik-Ra He shall call אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim to the heavens מֵעָ֑ל <WH5920> me-'Al; from above וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, and to the earth לָדִ֥ין <WH1777> la-Din that he may judge עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> am-Mo. his people

אִסְפוּ־ <WH622> 'is-fu- Gather לִ֥י li חֲסִידָ֑י <WH2623> cha-si-Dai; my saints כֹּרְתֵ֖י <WH3772> ko-re-Tei together unto me those that have made בְרִיתִ֣י <WH1285> ve-ri-Ti a covenant עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> 'a-lei- with זָֽבַח׃ <WH2077> Za-vach. with me by sacrifice

וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> vai-yag-Gi-du shall declare שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim And the heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> tzid-Ko; his righteousness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For אֱלֹהִ֓ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him for God שֹׁפֵ֖ט <WH8199> sho-Fet [is] judge ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu Himself סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. himself Selah

שִׁמְעָ֤ה <WH8085> shim-'Ah Hear עַמִּ֨י׀ <WH5971> 'am-Mi O my people וַאֲדַבֵּ֗רָה <WH1696> va-'a-dab-Be-rah, and I will speak יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el O Israel וְאָעִ֣ידָה <WH5749> ve-'a-'I-dah and I will testify בָּ֑ךְ Bach; אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him against thee I [am] God אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha [even] thy God אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> 'a-No-chi. I

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for זְ֭בָחֶיךָ <WH2077> Ze-va-chei-cha thee for thy sacrifices אוֹכִיחֶ֑ךָ <WH3198> o-chi-Che-cha; I will not reprove וְעוֹלֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH5930> ve-'o-lo-Tei-cha or thy burnt offerings לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> le-neg-Di before תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> ta-Mid. [to have been] continually

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no אֶקַּ֣ח <WH3947> 'ek-Kach I will take מִבֵּיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> mib-bei-te-Cha out of thy house פָ֑ר <WH6499> Far; no bullock מִ֝מִּכְלְאֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH4356> mi-mich-le-'o-Tei-cha, out of thy folds עַתּוּדִֽים׃ <WH6260> 'at-tu-Dim. [nor] he goats

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for לִ֥י li כָל־ <WH3605> chol every חַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> chay-tov- For every beast יָ֑עַר <WH3293> Ya-'ar; of the forest בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <WH929> be-he-Mot, [is] mine [and] the cattle בְּהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> be-har-rei- hills אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. upon a thousand

יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> Ya-da'-ti I know כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every ע֣וֹף <WH5775> of all the fowls הָרִ֑ים <WH2022> ha-Rim; of the mountains וְזִ֥יז <WH2123> ve-Ziz and the wild beasts שָׂ֝דַ֗י <WH7704> Dai, of the field עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> 'im-ma-Di. [are] mine

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If אֶ֭רְעַב <WH7456> 'Er-'av If I were hungry לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not אֹ֣מַר <WH559> 'O-mar I would not tell לָ֑ךְ Lach; כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for לִ֥י li תֵ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> te-Vel, thee for the world וּמְלֹאָֽהּ׃ <WH4393> u-me-lo-'Ah. [is] mine and the fulness

הַֽ֭אוֹכַל <WH398> Ha-'o-chal Will I eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> be-Sar the flesh אַבִּירִ֑ים <WH47> 'ab-bi-Rim; of bulls וְדַ֖ם <WH1818> ve-Dam the blood עַתּוּדִ֣ים <WH6260> 'at-tu-Dim of male אֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> 'esh-Teh. or drink

זְבַ֣ח <WH2076> ze-Vach Offer לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> le-lo-Him unto God תּוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> to-Dah; thanksgiving וְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> ve-shal-Lem and pay לְעֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> le-'el-Yon unto the most High נְדָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5088> ne-da-Rei-cha. thy vows

וּ֭קְרָאֵנִי <WH7121> U-ke-ra-'e-ni And call בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom upon me in the day צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> tza-Rah; of trouble אֲ֝חַלֶּצְךָ֗ <WH2502> 'a-chal-letz-cha, I will deliver וּֽתְכַבְּדֵֽנִי׃ <WH3513> U-te-chab-be-De-ni. thee and thou shalt glorify

וְלָ֤רָשָׁ֨ע׀ <WH7563> ve-La-ra-Sha' But unto the wicked אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar saith אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, God מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What לְּ֭ךָ Le-cha לְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> le-sap-Per What hast thou to do to declare חֻקָּ֑י <WH2706> chuk-Kai; my statutes וַתִּשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> vat-tis-Sa or [that] thou shouldest take בְרִיתִ֣י <WH1285> ve-ri-Ti my covenant עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> 'a-lei- and פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> Fi-cha. according

וְ֭אַתָּה <WH859> Ve-'at-tah you שָׂנֵ֣אתָ <WH8130> sa-Ne-ta Seeing thou hatest מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> mu-Sar; instruction וַתַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <WH7993> vat-tash-Lech and castest דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> de-va-Rai my words אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-cha. behind

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- When רָאִ֣יתָ <WH7200> ra-'I-ta When thou sawest גַ֭נָּב <WH1590> gan-no a thief וַתִּ֣רֶץ <WH7521> vat-Ti-retz then thou consentedst עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo; with וְעִ֖ם <WH5973> ve-'Im with מְנָאֲפִ֣ים <WH5003> me-na-'a-Fim with adulterers חֶלְקֶֽךָ׃ <WH2506> chel-Ke-cha. with him and hast been partaker

פִּ֭יךָ <WH6310> Pi-cha thy mouth שָׁלַ֣חְתָּ <WH7971> sha-Lach-ta Thou givest בְרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> ve-ra-'Ah; to evil וּ֝לְשׁוֹנְךָ֗ <WH3956> u-le-shon-cha, and thy tongue תַּצְמִ֥יד <WH6775> tatz-Mid frameth מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> mir-Mah. deceit

תֵּ֭שֵׁב <WH3427> Te-shev Thou sittest בְּאָחִ֣יךָ <WH251> be-'a-Chi-cha against thy brother תְדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> te-dab-Ber; [and] speakest בְּבֶֽן־ <WH1121> be-ven- son אִ֝מְּךָ֗ <WH517> 'im-me-cha, thine own mother's תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> tit-ten- thou דֹּֽפִי׃ <WH1848> Do-fi. slanderest

אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These עָשִׂ֨יתָ׀ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta These [things] hast thou done וְֽהֶחֱרַ֗שְׁתִּי <WH2790> ve-he-che-Rash-ti, and I kept silence דִּמִּ֗יתָ <WH1819> dim-Mi-ta, thou thoughtest הֱֽיוֹת־ <WH1961> he-yot- that I was altogether אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh was just כָמ֑וֹךָ <WH3644> cha-Mo-cha; like אוֹכִיחֲךָ֖ <WH3198> o-chi-cha-Cha [such an one] as thyself [but] I will reprove וְאֶֽעֶרְכָ֣ה <WH6186> ve-'e-'er-Chah thee and set [them] in order לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei-cha. before thine eyes

בִּֽינוּ־ <WH995> bi-nu- Now consider נָ֣א <WH4994> na Now זֹ֭את <WH2063> zot who שֹׁכְחֵ֣י <WH7911> sho-che-Chei this ye that forget אֱל֑וֹהַּ <WH433> e-Lo-ah; God פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- Or אֶ֝טְרֹ֗ף <WH2963> 'et-Rof, lest I tear [you] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> matz-Tzil. and [there be] none to deliver

זֹבֵ֥חַ <WH2076> zo-Ve-ach Whoso offereth תּוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> to-Dah, praise יְֽכַ֫בְּדָ֥נְנִי <WH3513> ye-Chab-be-Da-ne-ni glorifieth וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> ve-Sam me and to him that ordereth דֶּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech; [his] conversation אַ֝רְאֶ֗נּוּ <WH7200> 'ar-'En-nu, [aright] will I shew בְּיֵ֣שַׁע <WH3468> be-Ye-sha' the salvation אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God
